item.title: Could Factory Farming be a farming be better for the world?
item.description:

item.title: Is owning a pet akin to factory farming? || The Foolery Show S2E3
item.description:

Check out the The Foolery Show: Season 2. Weekly Uploads every Tuesday

item.title: Should you trust a charity? || The Foolery Show S2E5
item.description:
Are charities a scam? Are they even worth donating to? How can you trust someone to give charitable donations? Leave a comment and tell us what you think or what we should talk about next!
Check out the The Foolery Show: Season 2. Weekly Uploads every Tuesday
